titles.title: Electing certain Members to standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
6/10/2015--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Science, Space, and Technology; and (3) Small Business.
